message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer. $12,000 is a good starting point, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my budget.  I'd be willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still looking to make a decent profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11,500. It's the best I can do at this point.
